thread.title: K2 Overdose Tally Grows to 56 in Brooklyn

author: Zolan Kanno-Youngs
title: K2 Overdose Tally Grows to 56 in Brooklyn
text:
Two years after it turned a Brooklyn intersection into so-called “zombieland,” the synthetic drug known as K2 has emerged again, causing 56 overdoses since Saturday, law-enforcement officials said Tuesday.
The dozens of people hospitalized all overdosed in five different locations in Brooklyn, including the area of Broadway and Myrtle Avenue. Near that intersection in July 2016, 33 people overdosed on a similar form of the drug, with many seen at the time shaking and writhing on the ground.
